website_summaries.verdict: Convenient individual packets of drink mix, and formula doesn't contain any sugar.
pros: Works to increase the body's metabolism to aid in losing weight
Packets are sized for adding to a common 16.9-ounce water bottle for on-the-go convenience
Mixes thoroughly with water for a good consistency with a berry flavor
cons: Costs more than taking Hydroxycut capsules

customer_reviews.title: I have lost 55 pounds so far, I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I have lost 55 pounds so far, I have tried about 3 other products and got no where, the secret for me was the water intake. It works mainly because of water intake :)
customer_reviews.author: tabatha encarnacion

customer_reviews.title: Use with caution
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the product. It gives me energy and great altertness. I use only half a packet at a time as it raises my blood pressure quickly. My appetite is down and I am slowly losing weight.
customer_reviews.author: JoLawr

customer_reviews.title: Great Energy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best weight loss products I have tried, it gave me energy to get in my morning run/workout an it has already allowed me to lose 3 lbs in a week in a half! Plus it actually tastes pretty good, very berry in flavor
customer_reviews.author: saramichelle

customer_reviews.title: ... over a week now and I have been very happy with it thus far
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Hydroxycut for a little over a week now and I have been very happy with it thus far. I have been taking it primarily as a pre workout and it gives me a nice boost of energy without any crash in my personal use. I like that it gives me smooth and clean pump and focus, no jitters or over stimulation.
customer_reviews.author: Naya169

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product - Taste Great and helps with Weight Cut and Coffee Replacement
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. First it taste great. I used it to cut weight and it was effective for that. I love coffee but at the same time I like to have a replacement for coffee so that I am not always drinking it daily. This was perefect for that and provided more energy than coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: It works. At least try it.
customer_reviews.text: This product works. I've been taking it for a week and with exercise and healthy eating it has helped me. I do have a faster metabolism and I am caffeine sensitive. The first few days you do have a heightened level of energy. I noticed a difference in working out. It feels like taking pre-workout supplements. It does taste sweet like Hawaiian punch.
customer_reviews.author: Dansher

customer_reviews.title: Beware of side effects.
customer_reviews.text: This product may cause failure in birth control. It can cause uterine bleeding as well due to the main ingredient being one that is supposed to cause women to give birth.
customer_reviews.author: J Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good...
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well, however you have to drink an entire bottle of water with each packet, so it seems as though it might just be that you're filling yourself with water before you eat. However, I did enjoy these packets. They were fruity, but not too sugary, and I was able to drink the whole bottle without feeling bloated or off. It did help stave off hunger - I used these for days when I worked over lunch - and I wasn't super starving when I was finally able to get some lunch.
customer_reviews.author: R. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Worth giving a chance
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say I'm not a fan... it's not super delish but definitely not disgusting I notice if you set a routine to drink it... you get better results which means I like to mix beforehand so it won't clump also I notice it's better cold so I mix 20 minutes ahead of time and put in freezer... this hydroxycut drink mix will become part of my daily routine... I tried the pill 2 weeks then this it was a small difference I lost 6 pounds just by walking and drinking this mix so any weighloss is a good weighloss... my only suggestion would be multiple flavors but I do recommend
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: The Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is good and easy to drink. I drink one on the way to work and another at lunch time. Keeps my cravings at bay. This is part of my daily regimen and have lost 21 pounds over a six week span. I exercise and eat right. I turn 1900 calories a day, so I'm not starving myself. I am certain this product has been a major contributor to my weight loss thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, worth a try
customer_reviews.text: Hoping it’s not a placebo effect but I have been losing weight. I also have been eating better and portioning what I eat and when I eat. I was doing a pre-workout powder before HydroxyCut. I ordered a second box and then might take a break and see if I stop losing weight. Flavor is very good, tastes like a fruit punch juice (not carbonated) I pour into a 12oz. Cold bottle of water before running out the door. I feel it gives me a little energy when I drink it in the morning also.
customer_reviews.author: TaylorMade

customer_reviews.title: I dont crave greasy food.
customer_reviews.text: Love this drink mix. It makes you constantly have bowel movements but without any pain. It also makes me drink alot of water and thats great because am not really a person that drinks water. And i feel full most of the time. I have notice a significant weight loss with this drink and i love that because am achieving my goal.
customer_reviews.author: Momma_bear2

customer_reviews.title: First, you need to listen. ..
customer_reviews.text: It may work for some, but I added this to my normal workout routine & I started having vertigo-like spells only while using this product. I stopped using it & all the symptoms stopped. After a few months I decided to give it another try & maybe see if it was just coincidence, but I started experiencing the same thing. It wasn't ever during my workouts that I would experience the spells, but just randomly throughout the day. I drank plenty of water/electrolytes & was closely monitoring my diet. It's definitely best to check with your doctor before using any kind of product. I've since stopped using it & have not had any such vertigo-like symptoms at all.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Derosia

customer_reviews.title: Not bad compared to others
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is good without the strange artificial sweetener aftertaste. It doesn't mix well into the water so I'm consistently shaking the bottle around, otherwise I end up with very concentrated liquid at the bottom. It also is a bit strong in flavor, so I mix it into a 20floz bottle of water instead of the recommended 16. Stills works, and gets me to drink more water. For the effects, I will say that it helps curb my appetite and really perks me up without giving me any jitters. Considering purchasing another box once this one runs out.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nong

customer_reviews.title: Has done nothing for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have only taken this for 1 week and I have not felt the energy or it has not curbed my appetite as it claims. Since there are so many good reviews I think I am doing something wrong. For example I am not drinking 10 glasses of water every day. That is near impossible and if I had known that before my purchase I probably would not of bought it. Any tips would be helpful. Maybe I have not given it enough time. I will continue to drink it until my package is gone.
customer_reviews.author: JMZ

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I will write an updated review in a few months. I was hoping it wouldn't have a bad taste because some reviews said negative things about the taste. It tastes exactly like fruit punch. It's best to make your own opinion before going solely on someone else's opinion. Stay tuned for a weight loss, or energy update. I just started using this today. 3 stars until I give my final review (on or before November 23rd). Updated review: I only noticed a 2-3 pound decrease. It makes you have to urinate frequently. Do not use if you are planning a road trip, or just don't have quick access to a restroom.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: RIP OFF!!
customer_reviews.text: Seller or someone removed half of the packets before sending. Supposed to have twenty one + a bonus of seven and only sent fourteen. Beware
customer_reviews.author: Sameul Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Got sick from the product. Yall need to emphasize the importance of the ingredients. My body broke out in a rash from my face, arms, and legs. My body was trembling and had bad nausea with accompanied dizziness. I almost ran to the hospital before my husband cut me off from the product. I couldn't believe it but soon after quitting cold turkey. I felt better than I have since I started drinking it. Beware
customer_reviews.author: Stev&flo

customer_reviews.title: Works well and gives me an energy boost I need ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well and gives me an energy boost I need to hit the gym hard. I cut 9 lbs in 1 week with this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Sarin Sao

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Took as directed and all it has done is made me bloated and give me stomach pain, it also leaves a long lasting bad taste in your mouth and no amount of gum, drinking water or even brushing your teeth can kill this awful flavor. Based off of my experience I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all as advertised for me.
customer_reviews.text: None of these work at all for me. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: S. R.

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: These taste amazing! I actually prefer these to soda and have cut my soda intake almost 90%. No weight loss yet but they don’t make me jittery and are a great update to normal water while working out!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Hydroxycut mixed berry tastes awful!
customer_reviews.text: Hydroxycut mixed berry tastes awful it has a sharp chemical taste. Hydroxycut really needs to make available the fruit punch flavor and if possible they should offer the liquid version again.
customer_reviews.author: kahn33.1

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this product . It tasted great gave me energy and reduced my appetite but not at such a rate that you'd become worried. I drink one every day in place of my regular morning coffee and i am loving the difference so far !
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Boost energy/curves appetite/tastes awful
customer_reviews.text: It does gives me a great boost of energy, & suppresses my Appetite like no other.. but I have to drink it fast b/c it’s not the best flavor wise, has a very chemical taste I can’t stand.
customer_reviews.author: Mel F.

customer_reviews.title: WoW!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, it mixes well and it helped me trim some fat. I drank it midday and it helped me make it through a long day of teaching 6th graders. My wife stole a few packs from me and she loves it as well. Said it made her feel energized without the jitters.
customer_reviews.author: Chris G

customer_reviews.title: Heart palpatations scared me
customer_reviews.text: It helped to curb my appetite but after 3 weeks, I started have bad heart palpatations. I quit using it and they went away.
customer_reviews.author: concerned

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty if you like fruit punch koolaid
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these. I've tasted them. Very tasty if you like fruit punch koolaid. Certainly gives him energy. No real feedback on weightloss. He uses them more for a pick me up. Will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki D

customer_reviews.title: The taste is awesome! Just make sure you follow directions on the ...
customer_reviews.text: The taste is awesome! Just make sure you follow directions on the amount of water to remove before adding the powder. It suppresses my appetite before my biggest meals of the day (lunch and dinner). It also provides almost instant energy!
customer_reviews.author: O'Leal

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor, withdrawal, urgency to pee alot.
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor. I noticed that when I use this I pee alot more. It says not to use it long term... when you stop, you will go through caffeine withdrawal. Jan 25, 2020: I have bought quite a few if these. They didn't seem to help me loose weight... I just liked the flavor. They need to make a caffeine free just water flavor packets in this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: S. Paczer

customer_reviews.title: Taste Awful
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived as scheduled. I mixed as directed and this stuff taste awful!!! Taste like unsweetened Kool-Aid drink!!. I am throwing this stuff in the garbage. Never buying again, there has to be something better to help with weight loss instead of this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: connie stinson

customer_reviews.title: Have taken this product for a while and seen no ...
customer_reviews.text: Have taken this product for a while and seen no reaults other than helped me mantain my wieght a little easier. Did make me a little shakey i taken without food.
customer_reviews.author: steve blankenship

customer_reviews.title: This tastes disgusting
customer_reviews.text: I did manage to get this down twice, but the taste is horrible. I now have 25 packets (one I made and just couldn't drink it!) of nastiness! Buy at your own risk...
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I weighed 140 lbs and I drank it for one day and lost pounds the same day. It makes you go to the restroom a lot and urinate. Also, I weighed myself at night and I was weighing 134 lbs. I do feel lightheaded and weak but I feel like I have to drink a lot more water.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Down 2lbs. in 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Taste Great and Works. I drink it all day long. Down 2lbs in 2weeks...
customer_reviews.author: 1985Power$

customer_reviews.title: I would waste the money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible tasting. Didnt notice any appetite suppressant just a stomach cramp.
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I recommend people try this !
customer_reviews.text: I used Purely Inspired Organic Protein drink in the morning, best organic protein mix I have ever tasted! than at 10 am I would eat a MuscleTech Soft Baked Whey Protein Cookie, for a quick lunch (better than a snickers) !! than a half hour before dinner I would drink a Hydroxycut Drink Mix, this stack has worked great for me as a energy enhancer and weight loss control !!! I recommend people try this !
customer_reviews.author: larry ellis

customer_reviews.title: Try something else
customer_reviews.text: We didn't like the way it made us feel. It made both of us feel sick and gave us a stomachache. did not take it very long due to that.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Headache
customer_reviews.text: This product made my head hurt.. it may work well with headaches occurring everytime you drink them. Use at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Miss K

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these! I use them as a preworkout. I have lost weight with this and exercise. I’ve ordered them 3 times now and still love them. Easy to drink and mix.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Nasty flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product for a long time and I love it. But this last time it has a very disgusting taste I have no idea why or what it is I hope the fix that soon and it's nothing to get sick for it, just the bad flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Cordon

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor, helps suppress appetite, and naturally energizes. The gummies also work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than energy drinks
customer_reviews.text: These work better than energy drinks and coffee!! No joke!! Try it I dare you! (Not everyone will have same effect than me) no shakes, no highs/ lows I feel clear headed I can think straight, have a great day all day
customer_reviews.author: EllaBella

customer_reviews.title: Terrible facial breakout
customer_reviews.text: I used 3 of these packets and within day 2 I had a terrible almost rash-like breakout on my left cheek. I'm talking like 20-30 little bumps. Terrible jitters and very tough time sleeping those 2 nights...I do not recommend this in any way. Use caution
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bombard

customer_reviews.title: Tasty juice drink
customer_reviews.text: Loved the flavor, I kind of wanted more portion that the recommended because it's very sweet, had to add more water. I combined with pills and gummies. I did felt some energy, but nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Zazhia

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Still in the process of using it but it gives you energy and helps suppress the appetite. I’ve already ordered my second one. Without the stimulants you can still drink it throughout the day and helps keep you pushing through. Working out, just getting through the day, and just helps I feel detox the body at the same time. Lost a few pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel P.

customer_reviews.title: To sick
customer_reviews.text: This product makes you feel so sick ! I have tried a lot of these I thought you could pair these with the pills for extra help with weight loss and appetite but you can’t you can only take two of the packets a day . It gives me the shakes and I literally feel like I’m having a heart attack and I do t have any energy with these either
customer_reviews.author: MissB

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: The flavor was good but it didn't do anything to curb my appetite.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy. This gave me bad headaches. Taste is very fake. No energy.
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: Magical
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for weight loss if you follow their diet you will the result in less than 2 months
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Tasty drink
customer_reviews.text: I had to stop drinking it because my body would get very hot and I would perspire uncontrollably for about an hour, 2 hours after I would consume it. It has a good taste and dissolved well.
customer_reviews.author: Apryl Howard

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t do anything, been using it for two weeks and I haven’t lost a single pound... I’ll try it again just because if suppresses my appetite so I think I’ll eventually drop some pounds
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting product
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste! Easy to mix in water. I usually drink 1 after my morning walk before eating. No big weight loss but no weight gain - however I only drank 1 per day.
customer_reviews.author: Benji Duhon

customer_reviews.title: Empty packets
customer_reviews.text: My problem with this product is that I've ordered multiple boxes that have come with empty packets inside. They are sealed, but they do not have anything inside.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about a month now. I really do like this product because it gives me extra energy to get through my workouts after a long day of work without any jitters. It does help to suppress appetite a bit, as well. It mixes easily in a bottle of water and actually tastes good. I usually do only one drink per day before my workout, as I take the Ultra Lean capsules earlier in the day. Some days I will drink 2, depending on how tired I am. This system seems to be working pretty well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley R

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. Took it for 2wks ritually with great dieting and working out. Not a pound! The pills worked best. Not this!
customer_reviews.author: Wu-tang

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little worried about the taste but it actually isn’t bad and I like that I don’t have to remember to drink water with it.
customer_reviews.author: Freckledmommy

customer_reviews.title: Aftertaste is not pleasant
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to take, but it tastes awful. It has a nasty taste right as I consumed it and then an awful aftertaste. I literally had to force it down. It gave me a headache also. I prefer other forms.
customer_reviews.author: Inamagura

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like koolaid
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel any improvement from this but I'll buy it for the flavor all day long. Tastes just like koolaid
customer_reviews.author: Misty Ham

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Tastes odd, not like kool-aid. Don't work for losing weight. I think it's a gimmick. It's an expensive gimmick. I can get Crystal Light cheaper, tastes better and has same diet results.
customer_reviews.author: R. Duhon

customer_reviews.title: Taste is good, i use this in the morning to get my motor running. I don't like coffee.
customer_reviews.text: Taste is good, i use this in the morning to get my motor running. I don't like coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Lachtrupp

customer_reviews.title: Product missing pouches
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering these for a few months, great product but this pack I receive I have opened 4 and it’s empty. That’s 4 drinks i missed out on.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor and the product works great. I just sip it in a bottle of water at work and never seem to be hungry !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Idk how well it works. I am constantly running to the bathroom right now. It tastes great. I am not hyper and it seems to flush out water weight.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave me a headache... so i stopped using it after 3 days..
customer_reviews.author: Camryn LeBoeuf

customer_reviews.title: Don’t suggest
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this, on day two and this product has made me extremely nauseous and have stomach pains. Drank 30-60 minutes before a meal and still extremely nauseous afterwards. Also, has given me upset stomachs for the past two days. It tastes just like fruit punch so it’s easy to consume, but has affected me poorly.
customer_reviews.author: ashley weber

customer_reviews.title: Gives good boost
customer_reviews.text: Great product - good taste. Need to work out and eat well for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: Like it so well I think someone took it. I liked it because it was convenient and I could pour it according to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Lendon

customer_reviews.title: It curbs the appetite
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a month and seem to be working and, like the taste
customer_reviews.author: ronelda hebed

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good.......
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this product and I have to say that so far I am not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy B

customer_reviews.title: Great taste. Energy Booster!
customer_reviews.text: They give me energy but I’ve had no luck with weight loss because it starts burning calories and I get hungry! Lol. I love the taste and the energy kick though.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry in your purse and use as needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry in your purse and use as needed all you need is water and the drink mix! I love the convenience of carrying the energy that i need in a small pouch! I will continue to use this and other Hydroxycut products!
customer_reviews.author: Claliz

customer_reviews.title: Great energy booster
customer_reviews.text: I personally love this drink mix. It tastes better in warm water I’ve come to learn. It def boosts your energy levels and I have noticeably less bloating with consistent use. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Delicious energy drink!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. Lots of energy. Gives you that little bit of a boost to get through a really long, hard day.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana Brazell

customer_reviews.title: Disgustingly sweet
customer_reviews.text: Baaaaah , soo sweet I cant drink it and there is no return per their policy Waste
customer_reviews.author: Madeira

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Makes me not hungry all day long at the office
customer_reviews.author: Karen Black

customer_reviews.title: Good energy
customer_reviews.text: Worked to give me energy to replace coffee in morning but that's about it
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Tastes really good
customer_reviews.text: It's give you energy and it tastes really good it doesn't even taste like it's a energy drink I love it and it cut my appetite back to which is a major plus
customer_reviews.author: naketah owens

customer_reviews.title: It does not work
customer_reviews.text: It does not work. You won't lose weight with this diet.
customer_reviews.author: Da Vinchi

customer_reviews.title: Only take if you wanna camp on the toilet
customer_reviews.text: All it did was make me poo every three seconds....
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gresham

customer_reviews.title: Great energy
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of my favorite Hydroxycut products so far. I'm doing interval training and I keep a packet on me so I can quickly pour into a bottle of water before each meal. It tastes great and I find myself eating almost half less than what I used to. It gives me plenty of energy to endure my workouts and I find myself working out liberty l longer. I definitely recommend and would repurchase
customer_reviews.author: Mari. M

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the flavor
customer_reviews.text: This drink mix seems too sweet to my liking. This is probably a personal preference but I don't intend to order again.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Didn't lose weight but gave me a boost of energy.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor. About 1 hour appetite control
customer_reviews.text: Love the flavor. Sustains appetite for about an hour. Curves cravings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: High does of caffeine...really does not curb hunger as other products :cough: Revital U.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie G.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Two of these a day is more than enough and it clearly curbs my appetite and gives me energy.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t have much of an effect on my energy. Used for a couple weeks and didn’t notice any weight loss.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered to me on a timely manner. The flavor is great
customer_reviews.author: lilly

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I’ve lost 30lbs using it, along with a healthy diet (sort of keto but also just healthy eating.) The amazon subscription is also less expensive than buying at target!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Assisting with weight loss
customer_reviews.text: I have already lost 5 pounds in 1 week using this along with my normal exercise routine and healthy eating habits. I was at a plateau for the last couple of months and this seems to help me break through it!
customer_reviews.author: allison louise craig

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great.. Doesn't make you jittery and gives you energy that just comes natural.. Definitely will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor. Easy to travel with. Add to any drink.
customer_reviews.author: Lady G

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Same hydroxy cut in a faster in a very convenient way. I don't need to carry the whole box with me now. I could just take one packet with me and just use it anywhere i want. It really is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: shubham

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!
customer_reviews.text: Very good flavor, I open a bottle of water take a sip then pour in. It seems to be working pretty good. I have been very happy with results so far
customer_reviews.author: Shad E. Sharkey

customer_reviews.title: Good amount in box
customer_reviews.text: Good amount in the box, gives energy but don’t think i lost weight
customer_reviews.author: Michael  Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, great flavor!!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at how awesome these taste! It does give me energy and curbs my appetite. We’ll definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Crushed
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time, but the box was crushed.
customer_reviews.author: tcureton

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Great taste and kust the right amount of "kick"!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda E. Bell

customer_reviews.title: None
customer_reviews.text: Box was all broken to pieces some of the packages were no good
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great! I felt like it might’ve helped curb hunger, but I didn’t notice a HUGE difference, would still recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Hamad

product_meta.title: Hydroxycut Drink Mix Weight Loss Supplements, Wildberry Blast, 28 Count (Pack of 1)
product_meta.description:
Hydroxycut is the perfect weight loss supplement to help you reach your weight loss goals. Unlike other weight loss products, Hydroxycut is formulated with a weight loss driver backed by 2 scientific studies. The weight loss product continues to help countless people on a daily basis also contains caffeine anhydrous to give you fast acting energy and also help boost your metabolism. Losing weight with the Hydroxycut weight loss formula has never been more convenient.

*Subjects using the key weight loss ingredient in Hydroxycut (C. canephora robusta) for 60 days lost an average of 10.95 lbs with a low calorie diet, and 3.7 lbs in a separate 8 week study with a calorie reduced diet and moderate exercise.

BRAND STORY
By Hydroxycut
feature_bullets: Science backed key weight loss ingredient: Get advanced weight loss from green coffee bean extract researched to show significant results in two scientific studies
No added sugar: Contains zero sugar and only 10 calories per serving

Convenient and effective: Hydroxycut drink mix is perfect when you're on the go and will provide fast acting energy to fuel your busy day. 1People using the key ingredient in Hydroxycut Drink Mix (C. canephora robusta) in a 60-day study lost an average of 10.95 lbs. with a low-calorie diet, and 3.7 lbs. in a separate 8-week study with a calorie-reduced diet and moderate exercise
Enhanced energy: The researched dose of naturally sourced caffeine will give you the quick energy boost you want
Boost metabolism: A powerful metabolism boost from green coffee bean extract, a natural source of energy
